column5: Welcome to Baffin Bay Lodge. Located just 1 hour south of Corpus Christi and 4 hours from Houston, the lodge is a short 1-minute walk from a secluded beach. The area is perfect for Kayaks and SUP. This area is also renowned for its fantastic fishing and is famous for its trophy spotted seatrout and duck hunting. We have plenty of parking for your boat and the public boat ramp only a 8 min drive (URL HIDDEN)
column8: Recharge your batteries on a secluded beach
